subject: Contract negotiation call
description: Discussed final pricing and implementation timeline. Legal review expected by end of week.

subject: Technical documentation sent
description: Sent integration specs and API documentation. Awaiting technical team review.

subject: Final presentation to executive team
description: Presented solution to C-suite. Very positive reception. Contract to be sent today.

subject: Competitor analysis
description: Customer comparing with two competitors. Need to emphasize unique features and ROI.

subject: Budget confirmation
description: Budget approved for Q2. Legal review required before proceeding.

subject: Product demo scheduled
description: Demo scheduled for February 2nd. Will include training overview for 15-person team.

subject: Security questionnaire sent
description: Sent detailed security and compliance documentation addressing all concerns.

subject: Initial discovery call
description: Discussed requirements for CRM integration. Need to prepare technical spec.

subject: Deal closed successfully
description: Contract signed. Implementation kickoff scheduled for February 1st.

subject: Follow-up after loss
description: Sent thank you email. Will follow up in 3 months to check if needs have changed.

subject: Technical deep dive
description: Detailed technical presentation covering API capabilities and integration patterns.

subject: Price confirmation
description: Confirmed pricing structure. Customer very satisfied with proposed terms.
